effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is sleeping, this move has double power, and the target wakes up.

short_effect.sun_moon: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: If the target is asleep, has double power and wakes it up.

flavor_text.sun_moon: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.
